CustomField.formula:
IF (RecordType.Name = "Full Details Of Income/Living Expenses", (Gross_Monthly_IncomeC__c - (Income_Tax_Monthly_Payment_Prior_Loan__c + NIS_Contribution_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + NHT_Contributions_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Education_Tax_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c )),
IF ( RecordType.Name = "Short Summary of Income", Gross_Monthly_IncomeC__c + Other_Income__c , 0 ) )
CustomField.label: Total Inflows
